title: Journalist information
snippet:
Our market research firm wants to collect the contact information for all journalists/media/news organizations that have written about the U.S. legal marijuana/cannabis market. (It is very important that only articles on the U.S. LEGAL market are included. We do not want stories about police raids on marijuana growers/dealers).

We would like to collect the following:

Journalist name
Media Organization Name
Phone number - if available 
Email 
Url to the story they wrote

We plan to do a test run to make sure we're aligned with what we want and what you're collecting.
